VisualWebTechnologies Special cPanel Refugee Offer ($7.40/year or DirectAdmin from $5.28/year!)

luxembourg, shared, USA, visualwebtechnologies December 27, 2020 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

VisualWebTechnologies first appeared on LowEndBox back in September and they’ve embraced the community whole-heartedly since then.  They were a prominent shared hosting provider on LowEndTalk during Black Friday, dropping new special offers every few hours.  I picked up one myself and have been playing with it – so far, so good!

They’re back to squeeze one more offer into 2020.  Here’s what they have to say:

“Special cPanel Refugee Discount

Are you currently using a cPanel Hosting, and got affected by the cPanel price hike? No problem! No matter whether it is a cPanel Web Hosting, or a cPanel Reseller Hosting. We got some offers for you below with a recurring discount. 

New Season Sale Time!

Simply use the code **Let65** to claim 60% off your web hosting limited time Offer valid for first 25 orders 60% off after 25 orders 55% off so hurry up!. This is applicable to Yearly billing cycles. Offer is recurring

So, what web hosting packages do we offer? If you buy any up to 10GB plan and get $5 Credit on your client area.  Offer valid for the First 15 Users.   Just comment your order number.  Credit will be increase on plan according but make sure (Upto 10Gb plan and Purchase just comment your order number#.
First 15 Customers who’re ordering Cpanel Hosting 10GB Reseller – 10GB will also receive Extra 5GB Storage. Post your Order No. Here.”

Nice!  Great prices and bonus credit from a provider who loves the LEB/LET community.

VisualWebTechnologies is an Indian company (registration 0879L1ZN) and their WHOIS is public.  You can find their TOS on their web site.  You can pay with PayPal, credit/debit cards, and RazorPay for INR.

Read on to see the offers and learn more!
